resources.string: You have not set any mode till yet
This is the first release of Automatic Profile Shifter.\nThis application is developed by Sumit Kumar

Using this application:

You can define the time period in which your mobile profile will automatically get shifted from any profile to the defined profile.
You have to create a mode before this application to work in desired way. There are four type of profiles for the user which are Ringtone, Silent, Vibrate and Airplane.
 
In Ringtone mode your mobile will be in ringing mode, 
In Silent mode your mobile will become silent 
In Vibrate your mobile will be in vibration mode. 
In Airplane mode every wireless communications through your mobile will be stopped.
 
You can customize the modes on the basis of:
 
1. Ringing Modes 
2. Time 
3. Recurring Days 

In the case of two modes with same properties but different profiles, the mode which was created later will be executed. 

When there is no mode set the default mode activated is Ringing Mode. 
It has an accuracy of 1 minute, which means it scans for mode changes every 1 minute

This software is developed as a part of Open source development Project. Any harm or destruction to property because of this software must not be considered as responsibility of owner. You are free to make changes and modify the project according to your requirements without the rights of the original developer.\n
